snippet: The American first lady, Michelle Obama, will travel to Japan and Cambodia this month as part of an effort to support education for girls, the White House said Tuesday.
abstract: Michelle Obama promotes initiative to get more girls to attend school, traveling to Tokyo and Kyoto, Japan, and Siem Reap, Cambodia; reported 62 million girls worldwide do not attend school and initiative aims to reduce that number, thereby improving financial stability, health and well-being of girls.
lead_paragraph: The American first lady, Michelle Obama, will travel to Japan and Cambodia this month as part of an effort to support education for girls, the White House said Tuesday.

headline.main: Michelle Obama to Visit Japan and Cambodia
headline.print_headline: First Lady to Visit Japan and Cambodia
